name: Cross Numbers +
description:
Enjoy this challenging numbers puzzle.

Place correcty all the numbers to fill the grid.

Play different boards with various levels of difficulty.

More boards to come in future free updates.

Unlimited puzzles with twelve boards.

SWIPE TO DELETE and AUTO-FILL.

Delete easily swiping your finger, and rapidly fill cells with the new feature auto-fill.
